text:
I received my 2nd dose of @pfizerinc #COVID19 #vaccine. This is the best way I know to protect myself, patients, and loved ones while honoring those we’ve lost to this deadly pandemic. 

 #VaccinesSaveLives #ShareYourJourney #Pfizer #BioNTech #COVID #TrustScience #BelieveScience https://t.co/l2DbsOFgZn
